title: My adaptor doesn't work because the power went off
content:
When the power went off in our home, my charger was plugged in and i didn't remove it. And all the phone chargers in our house were plugged in too: 3 iphone adaptors and my ipad's adaptor. I'm the only one who has a pixel phone.
When the power came back i heard a sound coming from my charger. When i tried to charge my phone, the power brick didn't work but the cable and the converter socket do work normally.
Also, all the other apple chargers work normally unlike mine.
I live in Tunisia we have 220V and my phone is from Canada and all the other phones are from Canada too, that's why i use a converter because our outlets are the European ones.
